issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
the application is not run by the android emulator.
These messages appear at the prompt:

[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 8
C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\titanium\node_modules\longjohn\dist\longjohn.js:185
        throw e;
              ^
TypeError: Bad argument
    at ChildProcess.spawn (child_process.js:915:24)
    at exports.spawn (child_process.js:715:9)
    at async.parallel.powershell (C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\titanium-sdk\lib\windows.js:385:14)
    at C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:524:25
    at C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:111:13
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at _each (C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:32:24)
    at async.each (C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:110:9)
    at _parallel (C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:523:20)
    at async.parallel (C:\Users\myuser\AppData\Roaming\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\3.4.1.GA\node_modules\async\lib\async.js:539:9)
